FLAG_OWN_CAR: Flag if the client owns a car
PREV_CNT_PAYMENT_MEAN:
Mean term of previous credit 

 at application of the previous application
CC_AMT_BALANCE_MIN:
Minimum balance 

 during the month of previous credit
BUREAU_DAYS_CREDIT_ENDDATE_MAX:
Maximum remaining duration of CB credit (in days) 
 at the time of application in Home Credit
PREV_DAYS_DECISION_MIN:
Relative to current application 

 when was the decision about the latest 

 previous application made in days
BUREAU_AMT_CREDIT_SUM_MAX:
Maxium current credit amount 

 for the Credit Bureau credit
DAYS_BIRTH: Client's age at the time of application
INSTAL_PAYMENT_DIFF_MEAN:
Mean difference between the installment value 

 and the amount paid in each installment 

 of the previous credit
ACTIVE_AMT_CREDIT_MAX_OVERDUE_MEAN: Mean maximal amount overdue on the Credit Bureau active credit so far
INSTAL_DPD_MAX: Maximum number of days past due of the installments of previous credit
DAYS_EMPLOYED: How many days before the application the person started current employment
DAYS_LAST_PHONE_CHANGE: How many days before application did client change phone
POS_MONTHS_BALANCE_MAX:
Month of balance relative to application date 

 (-1 means the information to the freshest monthly snapshot, 

 0 means the information at application - 

 often it will be the same as -1 as many banks 

 are not updating the information to Credit Bureau regularly)
REFUSED_AMT_APPLICATION_MIN:
Minimum credit value the client ask for 

 on the previous refused application
REGION_RATING_CLIENT: Our rating of the region where client lives (1,2,3)
ORGANIZATION_TYPE_Self_employed: Whether the client is self employed
BUREAU_AMT_CREDIT_SUM_DEBT_MEAN: Mean current debt on Credit Bureau credit
BUREAU_DAYS_CREDIT_MAX:
Maximum number of days between the Credit Bureau application 

 and the current application
NAME_EDUCATION_TYPE_Higher_education: Whether the client has a higher education
